dcterms:description: A dataset providing a new look at the types of grants researchers are receiving by aggregating across a large number of funders who publicly report data.
dcterms:title: Dimensions

dcterms:description: A survey conducted by the National Science Foundation that collects data on research and development expenditures at higher education institutions in the U.S.
dcterms:title: National Science Foundation’s Higher Education Research and Development Survey (HERD)

dcterms:description: Data from the NIH's Maximizing Investigators’ Research Award (MIRA) program, which provides grants aimed at supporting researchers with longer funding durations but lower total amounts.
dcterms:title: National Institutes of Health (NIH) funding data
